type ListCollectionView = class inherit CollectionView interface IComparer interface IEditableCollectionViewAddNewItem interface IEditableCollectionView interface ICollectionViewLiveShaping interface IItemProperties

summary.span: Represents the collection view for collections that implement .

span.span: Represents the collection view for collections that implement .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您繫結至資料收集時，您可能想要排序、 篩選或分組資料。When you bind to a data collection, you may want to sort, filter, or group the data. 若要這樣做，您可以使用集合檢視。To do that, you use collection views. 您可以將為繫結來源集合，可讓您巡覽及顯示根據排序、 篩選和群組查詢的來源集合之上的層級，完全不需要管理基礎來源本身的集合。You can think of a as the layer on top of the binding source collection that allows you to navigate and display the source collection based on sort, filter, and group queries, all without having to manipulate the underlying source collection itself. 如果來源集合實作介面，所引發的變更事件傳播至檢視。If the source collection implements the interface, the changes raised by the event are propagated to the views. 所有集合都具有預設值。All collections have a default . 實作的所有集合、物件是預設檢視物件。For all collections implementing , the object is the default view object. 是集合檢視類別，用於實作的集合。The is the collection view class used for collections that implement . 若要取得的預設檢視，您使用方法。To get the default view, you use the method. 如需範例，請參閱[How to： 取得預設的檢視資料收集](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-get-the-default-view-of-a-data-collection.md)。For an example, see [How to: Get the Default View of a Data Collection](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-get-the-default-view-of-a-data-collection.md). 如需集合檢視的詳細資訊，請參閱[資料繫結概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For more information about collection views, see [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md).

summary.span: Starts an add transaction and returns the pending new item.

span.span: Starts an add transaction and returns the pending new item.
The pending new item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫開始加入異動。Calling starts an add transaction. 您應該呼叫或結束加入異動。You should call or to end the add transaction. 新的項目一律會顯示集合檢視中。A new item always appears in the collection view. 任何篩選、 排序或群組也就套用至檢視套用至新項目時呼叫。Any filtering, sorting, or grouping that is applied to the view is applied to the new item when is called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以建立新的項目集合，如果沒有任何編輯交易發生，如果集合不是固定的大小，而且如果可以建立正確型別的物件。The can create a new item for the collection if there is no edit transaction occurring, if the collection is not a fixed size, and if the can create an object of the correct type.

summary.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the collection view can discard pending changes and restore the original values of an edited object.

span.span: if the collection view can discard pending changes and restore the original values of an edited object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是`true`如果已編輯的項目實作介面。 is `true` if the edited item implements the interface. 如果是`false`，呼叫造成結束編輯狀態，提供邏輯以還原已編輯過的物件上變更檢視。If is `false`, call to cause the view to exit the edit state and provide logic to revert the changes on the object that was edited.

summary.span: Ends the edit transaction, and if possible, restores the original value to the item.

span.span: Ends the edit transaction, and if possible, restores the original value to the item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定至`null`及造成集合檢視結束編輯狀態。 sets to `null` and causes the collection view to exit the edit state. 如果是`true`，也會還原已編輯物件的原始值。If is `true`, also restores the original values of the edited object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Count As Integer
public: virtual property int Count { int get(); };

summary.span: Gets the estimated number of records.

span.span: Gets the estimated number of records.

value.span:
下列其中之一： 值意義
-1 無法判斷集合的計數。這可能會傳回 「 虛擬化 」 檢視中，其中檢視刻意並不考慮基礎的集合中的所有項目因為嘗試檢視提高效率，並盡可能縮短一律必須有可用的整個集合的相依性。
任何其他整數集合計數。

span.span:
One of the following: Value Meaning
-1 Could not determine the count of the collection. This might be returned by a "virtualizing" view, where the view deliberately does not account for all items in the underlying collection because the view is trying to increase efficiency and minimize dependence on always having the whole collection available.
any other integer The count of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請注意這個計數代表已篩選的計數。Note that this count represents the filtered count.

summary.span: Returns an object that you can use to enumerate the items in the view.

returns.span: An object that you can use to enumerate the items in the view.

span.span: An object that you can use to enumerate the items in the view.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列舉值執行個體通常用於非同步檢查內容的集合，或在此情況下，檢視的內容。Enumerator instances are typically used for making asynchronous checks of the contents of a collection, or in this case, the contents of the view. 例如，如果您要啟動`foreach`反覆項目之內容的檢視，可能比較適合取得非同步複本，確保檢視項目長度不會不會變更當中發生非預期迴圈。For example, if you are about to start a `foreach` iteration over the contents of the view, it may be better to obtain an asynchronous copy to ensure that the length of the view items does not change unexpectedly midway through the loop.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性只能設定所存取的集合物件和使用的各種方法，例如`Add`。This property can only be set by accessing the collection object and using its various methods such as `Add`. 用來存取集合物件本身屬性是唯讀的。集合本身是讀取/寫入。The property to access the collection object itself is read-only; the collection itself is read/write. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用這個屬性：The following example shows how to use this property: [!code-csharp[DataBindingLab#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataBindingLab/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#6)] [!code-vb[DataBindingLab#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataBindingLab/VisualBasic/MainWindow.xaml.vb#6)] 完整的範例，請參閱[資料繫結示範](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703)。For the complete example, see [Data Binding Demo](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703).

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the list of items (after applying the sort and filters, if any) is already in the correct order for grouping.

value.span: 如果項目清單已在正確的順序來分組。否則， 。

span.span: if the list of items is already in the correct order for grouping; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性設定為`true`會通知檢視項目清單已在正確的順序來分組，並允許使用更有效率的演算法來建置群組檢視。Setting this property to `true` informs the view that the list of items is already in the correct order for grouping and allows the view to use a more efficient algorithm to build the groups. 資料是正確的順序如果：The data is in the correct order if: 1. 屬於特定群組的所有項目依序出現和All items belonging to a given group appear consecutively, and 2. 如果集合為非空白的群組中會出現在其他任何群組之前和在相同的順序。If the collection is non-empty, the groups in appear before any other groups, and in the same order as in .

summary.span: Removes the item at the specified position from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `index` 是相對於集合檢視，而不是集合。`index` is relative to the collection view, not the collection. 例如，如果集合具有 10 個項目和檢視具有使之出現 7 項目，有效的值`index`是從 0 到 6。For example, if the collection has 10 items and the view has a so that 7 items appear, the valid values of `index` are 0 through 6.

exception.span: is less than 0 or greater than the number of items in the collection view.
